Text: Thanks again lordmichael. And please keep checking tarpley.net over the next few days: we're about to switch the new site over there. The old site is awful and the new one will feature a blog that webster will update frequently! Also many of his lectures and interviews are available.
A pleasure, ludwignosen. Sounds good about Tarpley's site, I'll look out for that - he could do with an updated site and the blog sounds like an excellent idea.
